snippet: A Thai court said Tuesday that soldiers killed six people in 2010 at a Buddhist temple during the military crackdown on antigovernment demonstrators in Bangkok.
abstract: Thai court says soldiers killed six people in 2010 at a Buddhist temple during military crackdown on antigovernment demonstrators in Bangkok; about 90 people were killed in total during protests.
lead_paragraph: A Thai court said Tuesday that soldiers killed six people in 2010 at a Buddhist temple during the military crackdown on antigovernment demonstrators in Bangkok.

headline.main: Thailand: Court Finds Soldiers Killed 6 at Temple
headline.print_headline: Thailand: Court Finds Soldiers Killed Six at Temple
